name: Avoid unreferenced Programs  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches the all the unreferenced programs
output:
This report lists RPG300 unreferenced programs.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name
rationale:
Unreferenced code may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance. 
Warning: 
Unreferenced code can also be the symptoms of missing code.
remediation: Verify that the unreferenced programs are not dead code. If it is the case remove it. If  it is not the case correct the code in order to reference the programs.
